name: Robot Warehouse Game
description:
In Robot Warehouse Game you can programm robots with Lua in two game modes. In the challenge mode you have to solve a labyrinth and can collect gold nuggest to get a better score. In the normal game mode you manage a warehouse and buy items and tools like robots and shelves and fufill contracts to make money.

Team:
Dominik Tödling
Lukas Neuhold
Franz Karl Adler
Valentin Josef Adler

Music:
"Floating" by Austin Lee Matthews
"SquigglyDigglyDitty" by Austin Lee Matthews
"I would cross the stars for you" by Austin Lee Matthews

Sounds:
button - public domain

conveyorbelt - by freemaster2 https://freesound.org/people/freemaster2/sounds/172350/
robotmoveturn - by pacdv http://www.pacdv.com/sounds/index.html
robotputtake - by mikerie https://freesound.org/people/mikerie/sounds/393135/
contractfail - public domain
contractsuccess - public domain
